short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remember your position on any page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pagemarks are like bookmarks, but for a specific place within a webpage.  One or more pagemarks can be set on most any webpage.  Clicking the toolbar icon will scroll the screen to the first/next pagemark.
